title: Client is shown as Black screen
body: So i clicked my launcher and it launches as usual however when it gives me the client window, where you would type in your password to connect online, as a black screen and it stays like that. i don't know whats wrong please help.

replies.body: That black screen typically means your client is having a hard time figuring out what it's supposed to show you. It could be that your network can't get a solid connection with our servers. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to get back on the Rift!

Likely due to a failure in establishing a connection to the client servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
